get.summary: Returns the currently active war season ID.
Get a snapshot of the current war status.
Retrieves a list of news messages from Super Earth.
Retrieves a list of currently active assignments (like Major Orders).
Fetches a list of all available Assignment information available.
Fetches a specific Assignment identified by index.
Fetches a list of all available Campaign information available.
Fetches a specific Campaign identified by index.
Fetches a list of all available Dispatch information available.
Fetches a specific Dispatch identified by index.
Fetches a list of all available Planet information available.
Fetches a specific Planet identified by index.
Fetches all planets with an active Event.
Fetches the Steam newsfeed for Helldivers 2.
get.description: You can definitely get this yourself, however it's included for your convenience!

get.summary: Fetches a specific newsfeed item from the Helldivers 2 Steam newsfeed.
get.description: You can definitely get this yourself, however it's included for your convenience!

404.description: Returned when the key is not recognized.

WarId.description: Represents the ID returned from the WarID endpoint.

WarStatus.description: Represents a snapshot of the current status of the galactic war.

warId.description: The war season this snapshot refers to.

time.description: The time this snapshot was taken.

impactMultiplier.description: This is the factor by which XP at the end of a mission is multiplied to calculate the impact on liberation

planetStatus.description: A list of statuses for planets.

planetAttacks.description: A list of attacks currently ongoing.

campaigns.description: A list of ongoing campaigns in the galactic war.

PlanetStatus.description: Represents the 'current' status of a planet in the galactic war.

index.description: The identifier of the PlanetInfo this status refers to.

owner.description: The faction currently owning the planet.

health.description: The current health / liberation of a planet.

regenPerSecond.description: If left alone, how much the health of the planet would regenerate.

players.description: The amount of helldivers currently active on this planet.

PlanetAttack.description: Represents an attack on a PlanetInfo.

planetIndex.description: The Index of the planet this campaign refers to.

type.description: A numerical type, indicates the type of campaign (see helldivers-2/json).

count.description: A numerical count, the amount of campaigns the planet has seen.

PlanetEvent.description: An ongoing event on a planet.

id.description: The unique identifier of this event.

eventType.description: A numerical identifier that indicates what type of event this is.

race.description: The identifier of the faction that owns the planet currently.

health.description: The current health of the planet.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of a related campaign.

jointOperationIds.description: A list of identifiers of related joint operations.

WarInfo.description: Represents mostly static information of the current galactic war.

warId.description: The identifier of the war season this WarInfo represents.

startDate.description: A unix timestamp (in seconds) when this season started.

endDate.description: A unix timestamp (in seconds) when this season will end.

minimumClientVersion.description: A version string indicating the minimum game client version the API supports.

planetInfos.description: A list of planets involved in this season's war.

homeWorlds.description: A list of homeworlds for the races (factions) involved in this war.

PlanetInfo.description: Represents information of a planet from the 'WarInfo' endpoint returned by ArrowHead's API.

index.description: The numerical identifier for this planet, used as reference by other properties throughout the API (like Waypoints).

position.description: A set of X/Y coordinates specifying the position of this planet on the galaxy map.

waypoints.description: A list of links to other planets (supply lines).

sector.description: The identifier of the sector this planet is located in.

maxHealth.description: The 'health' of this planet, indicates how much liberation it needs to switch sides.

disabled.description: Whether this planet is currently considered active in the galactic war.

initialOwner.description: The identifier of the faction that initially owned this planet.

PlanetCoordinates.description: Represents a set of coordinates returned by ArrowHead's API.

HomeWorld.description: Represents information about the homeworld(s) of a given race.

race.description: The identifier of the race (faction) this describes the homeworld of.

WarSummary.description: Gets general statistics about the galaxy and specific planets.

galaxy_stats.description: Contains galaxy wide statistics aggregated from all planets.

missionTime.description: The total amount of time spent planetside (in seconds).

bugKills.description: The total amount of bugs killed since start of the season.

automatonKills.description: The total amount of automatons killed since start of the season.

illuminateKills.description: The total amount of Illuminate killed since start of the season.

bulletsFired.description: The total amount of bullets fired

bulletsHit.description: The total amount of bullets hit

timePlayed.description: The total amount of time played (including off-planet) in seconds.

deaths.description: The amount of casualties on the side of humanity.

friendlies.description: The amount of friendly fire casualties.

missionSuccessRate.description: A percentage indicating how many started missions end in success.

accurracy.description: A percentage indicating average accuracy of Helldivers.

PlanetStats.description: Similar to GalaxyStats, but scoped to a specific planet.

planetIndex.description: The Index for which planet these stats are.

missionTime.description: The total amount of time spent planetside (in seconds).

bugKills.description: The total amount of bugs killed since start of the season.

automatonKills.description: The total amount of automatons killed since start of the season.

illuminateKills.description: The total amount of Illuminate killed since start of the season.

bulletsFired.description: The total amount of bullets fired

bulletsHit.description: The total amount of bullets hit

timePlayed.description: The total amount of time played (including off-planet) in seconds.

deaths.description: The amount of casualties on the side of humanity.

friendlies.description: The amount of friendly fire casualties.

missionSuccessRate.description: A percentage indicating how many started missions end in success.

accurracy.description: A percentage indicating average accuracy of Helldivers.

NewsFeedItem.description: Represents an item in the newsfeed of Super Earth.

id.description: The identifier of this newsfeed item.

published.description: A unix timestamp (in seconds) when this item was published.

message.description: The message containing a human readable text.

Assignment.description: Represents an assignment given from Super Earth to the Helldivers.

progress.description: A list of numbers, how they represent progress is unknown.

expiresIn.description: The amount of seconds until this assignment expires.

setting.description: Contains detailed information on this assignment like briefing, rewards, ...

Setting.description: Contains the details of an Assignment like reward and requirements.

type.description: The type of assignment, values unknown at the moment.

taskDescription.description: A description of what is expected of Helldivers to complete the assignment.

tasks.description: A list of Tasks describing the assignment requirements.

reward.description: Contains information on the rewards players willr eceive upon completion.

flags.description: Flags, suspected to be a binary OR'd value, purpose unknown.

Task.description:
Represents a task in an Assignment.
It's exact values are not known, therefore little of it's purpose is clear.

values.description: A list of numerical values, purpose unknown.

valueTypes.description: A list of numerical values, purpose unknown.

Reward.description: Represents the reward of an Assignment.

type.description: The type of reward, currently only one value is known: 1 which represents Medals

amount.description: The amount of Type the players will receive upon completion.

War.description: Global information of the ongoing war.

ended.description: When this war will end (or has ended).

now.description: The time the snapshot of the war was taken, also doubles as the timestamp of which all other data dates from.

clientVersion.description: The minimum game client version required to play in this war.

factions.description: A list of factions currently involved in the war.

impactMultiplier.description: A fraction used to calculate the impact of a mission on the war effort.

statistics.description: The statistics available for the galaxy wide war effort.

Statistics.description: Contains statistics of missions, kills, success rate etc.

missionTime.description: The total amount of time spent planetside (in seconds).

terminidKills.description: The total amount of bugs killed since start of the season.

automatonKills.description: The total amount of automatons killed since start of the season.

illuminateKills.description: The total amount of Illuminate killed since start of the season.

bulletsFired.description: The total amount of bullets fired

bulletsHit.description: The total amount of bullets hit

timePlayed.description: The total amount of time played (including off-planet) in seconds.

deaths.description: The amount of casualties on the side of humanity.

friendlies.description: The amount of friendly fire casualties.

missionSuccessRate.description: A percentage indicating how many started missions end in success.

accuracy.description: A percentage indicating average accuracy of Helldivers.

playerCount.description: The total amount of players present (at the time of the snapshot).

Assignment2.description:
Represents an assignment given by Super Earth to the community.
This is also known as 'Major Order's in the game.

id.description: The unique identifier of this assignment.

briefing.description: A long form description of the assignment, usually contains context.

description.description: A very short summary of the description.

tasks.description: A list of tasks that need to be completed for this assignment.

reward.description: The reward for completing the assignment.

Task2.description:
Represents a task in an Assignment that needs to be completed
to finish the assignment.

type.description: The type of task this represents.

values.description: A list of numbers, purpose unknown.

valueTypes.description: A list of numbers, purpose unknown

Reward2.description: The reward for completing an Assignment.

type.description: The type of reward (medals, super credits, ...).

amount.description: The amount of Type that will be awarded.

Campaign2.description: Represents an ongoing campaign on a planet.

id.description: The unique identifier of this Campaign.

planet.description: The planet on which this campaign is being fought.

type.description: The type of campaign, this should be mapped onto an enum.

count.description: Indicates how many campaigns have already been fought on this Planet.

Planet.description: Contains all aggregated information AH has about a planet.

index.description: The unique identifier ArrowHead assigned to this planet.

name.description: The name of the planet, as shown in game.

sector.description: The name of the sector the planet is in, as shown in game.

hash.description: A hash assigned to the planet by ArrowHead, purpose unknown.

position.description: The coordinates of this planet on the galactic war map.

waypoints.description: A list of Index of all the planets to which this planet is connected.

maxHealth.description: The maximum health pool of this planet.

health.description: The current planet this planet has.

disabled.description: Whether or not this planet is disabled, as assigned by ArrowHead.

initialOwner.description: The faction that originally owned the planet.

currentOwner.description: The faction that currently controls the planet.

regenPerSecond.description: How much the planet regenerates per second if left alone.

event.description: Information on the active event ongoing on this planet, if one is active.

statistics.description: A set of statistics scoped to this planet.

Position.description: Represents a position on the galactic war map.

Event.description: An ongoing event on a Planet.

id.description: The unique identifier of this event.

faction.description: The faction that initiated the event.

health.description: The health of the Planet at the time of snapshot.

campaignId.description: The identifier of the Campaign linked to this event.

jointOperationIds.description: A list of joint operation identifier linked to this event.

Dispatch.description: A message from high command to the players, usually updates on the status of the war effort.

id.description: The unique identifier of this dispatch.

type.description: The type of dispatch, purpose unknown.

SteamNews.description: Represents a new article from Steam's news feed.

id.description: The identifier assigned by Steam to this news item.

title.description: The title of the Steam news item.

url.description: The URL to Steam where this news item was posted.

author.description: The author who posted this message on Steam.

content.description: The message posted by Steam, currently in Steam's weird markdown format.
